resources.string: Score Predict offers you the ability to test your football knowledge. Try to predict the score of each game by the end. You are able to predict the score up till the point the game starts. Based on the score at the end you will be awarded as much as 50pts. The scale is shown below. So give it a try and see what how well you can predict the score.
If you predict the number of points a team scores:
\u00A9 The team names and logos are registered trademarks of the teams indicated.
Facebook information used for authentication purposes only
Could not connect to Score Predict. Please check your connection

This application is not affiliated with the NFL\u2122 in any way. This application is provided for amusement purposes only for no charge. It is not intended to conduct betting or gambling activities. All team names and logos are the property of the NFL\u2122 and their respective franchises.
